channel.title: Water Management on Jeisson Prieto
channel.description: Recent content in Water Management on Jeisson Prieto

item.title: Optimal Reservoir Control for Managing Conflicting Demands in the Panama Canal
item.description: Stochastic dynamic programming model to optimize water management in the Panama Canal System under climate-induced variability. Balancing navigation, hydropower, and municipal supply, the model enhances operational efficiency and resilience, especially during ENSO events, by improving storage use and minimizing trade-offs among competing water demands.
